name: Leder Panzer
description: Multiplayer tank game with a mad weapon arsenal and tactics, different levels and game modes, ballistics, nukes, napalm, bigger nukes, air and anti-air weapons and personified tank characters with special abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
